name: wit-ast-js
description: JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for wit-ast WASM component

scripts.build:component: wasm-tools component new ../../target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/wit_ast.wasm -o wit-ast.wasm --adapt wasi_snapshot_preview1=adapters/wasi_snapshot_preview1.reactor.wasm 2>/dev/null || wasm-tools component new ../../target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/wit_ast.wasm -o wit-ast.wasm
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:component && npm run transpile
scripts.demo: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run example
